xmlText.p: First Period_1, New Jersey, Zajac 8 (Noesen), 1:57. 2, Ottawa, Hoffman 14 (Duchene, Karlsson), 13:35 (pp). 3, Ottawa, DiDomenico 5 (Dzingel, Ceci), 14:33 (pp). 4, Ottawa, Duchene 13 (Hoffman, Claesson), 18:58. Penalties_Coleman, NJ, (roughing), 11:55; Palmieri, NJ, (high sticking), 13:02.

Second Period_5, Ottawa, White 1 (Duchene, Chabot), 8:43. 6, New Jersey, Hall 19 (Palmieri, Zacha), 10:54 (pp). 7, Ottawa, Smith 4 (Pageau, Burrows), 19:12. Penalties_Lovejoy, NJ, served by Wood, (roughing), 3:18; Lovejoy, NJ, Major (fighting), 3:18; McCormick, OTT, Major (fighting), 3:18; Karlsson, OTT, (slashing), 5:55; Burrows, OTT, (roughing), 10:02; Burrows, OTT, (cross checking), 10:02; Smith, OTT, (hooking), 17:07.
Third Period_8, New Jersey, Palmieri 11 (Zacha, Wood), 5:12. Penalties_Karlsson, OTT, (tripping), 14:10; Palmieri, NJ, (interference), 14:10.
Power-play opportunities_New Jersey 1 of 4; Ottawa 2 of 3.
Goalies_New Jersey, Lack 1-2-0 (12 shots-11 saves), Kinkaid 10-5-2 (20-16). Ottawa, Anderson 14-17-5 (33-30).
Referees_Jake Brenk, Dan O'Halloran. Linesmen_Devin Berg, Derek Nansen.
